configuration.name: widget_002828525769703183
configuration.stem: Arrange the sequence of events into the correct order to show how an animal processes information.

feedBack.firstWrongHint: Think about the cause and effect for each event.
feedBack.finalWrongHint: The predator is perceived, the information is sent to the brain, the brain processes it, the brain then sends signals to the body, and finally the animal escapes.

options.ddoText: Sensory info is sent to brain.
